sentence.text: With the notable exception of canonical Wnt signaling pathway (Tooth agenesis, selective, 4, MIM #150400), the genotype-phenotype relationships described in the present cohort represent an expansion of the clinical spectrum associated with these genes: sensory perception of sound (Deafness, autosomal recessive 98, MIM #614861), endodermal cell differentiation (Amelogenesis imperfecta, type IA, MIM #104530; Epidermolysis bullosa, junctional, MIMs #226700 and #226650), and histone H2A monoubiquitination (Microphthalmia, syndromic 2, MIM #300166).
